node.title: Christchurch man charged in relation to making and distributing false vaccine passes
node.description: The arrest this morning comes after the Stuff news outlet reported on a fake vaccine pass production line by a Rangiora man, as part of a sting.
node.content:
["A Christchurch man has been charged in relation to making and distributing false vaccine passes.", "", "
Scanning a legitimate vaccine pass. File image Photo: RNZ / Nate McKinnon
", "The arrest this morning comes after the Stuff news outlet reported on a fake vaccine pass production line by a Rangiora man, as part of a sting.", "Stuff says the man issued one of its reporters with a false pass and told them he had used his own fake copy to visit a person in prison.", "A police spokesperson told RNZ News that a 61-year-old male was taken into custody this morning, following the media report."]
